dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5308 IH: Rural Telehealth and Education Enhancement Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Langworthy (for himself, Ms. Pingree, Mr. Bishop of Georgia, Mr. Duarte, Mr. Golden of Maine, Mr. Davis of North Carolina, Ms. Salinas, Mr. Pappas, Ms. Budzinski, Ms. Tenney, Ms. Crockett, and Ms. Adams) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Distance Learning and Telemedicine Program of the Department of Agriculture.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Telehealth and Education Enhancement Act of 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Distance Learning and Telemedicine Program
section.text: Section 2335A of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 950aaaâ€“5) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2028.
